name: Supermarket Hero
description:
This game was developed during the "Stay Safe Jam" (03/27/20) by Bruno Fedrizzi, Gustavo Tozze and Pedro Miranda.

Our main goal with this project was to depict a friendly action during this whole situation we're currently going through. So we ended up creating a character that helps his elder neighbours by purchasing necessary items for them on the supermarket. Mind yourself that he has a lot of them, so your shopping list is pretty big.

Version v0.7(Level 3 Game Fix): https://drive.google.com/file/d/1CqZrijKqO1M27g2Zu7x8VCD1PA81CmAU/view?usp=shari...
